import React from "react"; // JSX import HeroSlider, { Slide } from "hero-slider"; import { Button, Container, Typography, Stack, useMediaQuery, CardMedia, Card, } from "@mui/material"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { styled } from "@mui/material/styles"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; const BackgroundContainer = styled(Container)({ // Your styles here backgroundImage: `url(./img/background.jpg)`, // Add more styles as needed }); export default function Slider() { const isMobile = useMediaQuery("(max-width: 1000px)"); const { i18n, t } = useTranslation(); const currentLanguage = i18n.language; return ( console.log("onBeforeChange", previousSlide, nextSlide) } onChange={(nextSlide) => console.log("onChange", nextSlide)} onAfterChange={(nextSlide) => console.log("onAfterChange", nextSlide)} autoplay controller={{ slidingDuration: 500, slidingDelay: 100 }} > {t("StoriesThatFrostTheTime")} {t("AnEpicExperience")} {t("AnEpicExperienceDescription")} {t("WordBearsTheSealOfTruth")} {t("HeroesOfTheDarkAges")} {t("HeroesOfTheDarkAgesDescription")} {t("ForUsFromUs")} {t("GamesForGamers")} {t("GamesForGamersDescription")}
); }
